meanings.definition: A person or company that grants a license.
meanings.sent1: The licensors approved the use of their logo on the product packaging.
meanings.sent2: The licensors have the authority to permit the distribution of the software.
meanings.sent3: The licensors decided to play a game of granting licenses for fun.
meanings.sent4: The licensors held the keys to the kingdom of licensing.
meanings.sent5: The licensors were like gatekeepers, allowing access to their intellectual property.

meanings.definition: The entity that holds the rights to grant a license.
meanings.sent1: Our company is one of the main licensors for this technology.
meanings.sent2: The licensors are responsible for ensuring compliance with licensing agreements.
meanings.sent3: The licensors threw a party to celebrate their licensing power.
meanings.sent4: The licensors' authority in granting licenses was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The licensors' role was crucial in the world of intellectual property rights.
